Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc12
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Network.Client

Class RMIClientSkeleton

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Network.NetworkSession
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Network.Client.RMIClientSkeleton
All Implemented Interfaces:
RMIVirtualClient, VirtualClient, Serializable, Remote
public class RMIClientSkeleton extends NetworkSession implements RMIVirtualClient
The RMIClientSkeleton class represent the skeleton that the Server must own for handling communication with a remote RMI client.
See Also:

    • createListener

      protected NetworkListener createListener(NetworkSession session)
      Creates a listener for the network session.

      Subclasses should implement this method to create a listener specific to the objects and events they would like to listen on.

    • close

      public void close()
      Description copied from class: NetworkSession
      Closes the communication channel of this NetworkSession.

      Implementations of this method should encapsulate the details of how the communication channel is closed, such as releasing resources and terminating connections.
